name: Signal Miner
description:
A short rhythm/platformer game.

Made for Mini jam 125.

WASDMovementSpace BarJump
EMine for gems (do in rhythm to the song beat)

In this quick platformer, you play a robot miner using his sensor to grab some gems and work his way to the top of an underground system.

Follow your antenna to find gems, mine in rhythm to the song beat, and avoid the lava as you make your way upwards and outwards!

Music/SFX created by Carter.Deken
